contactCard.contactBlurb: We are conveniently located and ready to assist you. Please feel free to stop by during our business hours or send us an email.

appointments.whatToBring: What to Bring to Your Appointment

heroSection.description: Providing comprehensive and efficient medical examinations for immigration, aviation, and transportation professionals. Our dedicated team is here to ensure a smooth and timely process for all your examination needs.

ourServicesSection.description: We offer a range of specialized medical examinations to meet your needs.

immigrationMedicalExams.title: Immigration Medical Exams
immigrationMedicalExams.description: USCIS-designated civil surgeon performing immigration medical exams.

faaPhysicals.title: FAA Physicals (2nd & 3rd Class)
faaPhysicals.description: FAA-designated aviation medical examiner performing pilot physicals.

dotPhysicals.title: DOT Physicals
dotPhysicals.description: FMCSA-certified medical examiner performing DOT physicals.

schoolSportsCampPhysicals.title: School/Sports/Camp Physicals
schoolSportsCampPhysicals.description: Comprehensive physicals for children and adolescents.

whyChooseUsSection.description: Discover the benefits of choosing our practice for your medical examination needs.

timelyAndEfficient.title: Timely & Efficient
timelyAndEfficient.description: We respect your time. Our processes are streamlined to ensure you are seen promptly and your results are delivered quickly.

experiencedAndCertified.title: Experienced & Certified
experiencedAndCertified.description: Our team is certified and experienced in FAA, DOT, and USCIS medical examinations, ensuring accuracy and compliance.

patientCenteredCare.title: Patient-Centered Care
patientCenteredCare.description: We believe in honest, clear communication and compassionate care. Your health and peace of mind are our top priorities.

meetOurTeamSection.description: Our dedicated professionals are here to provide you with the best service.

jill.name: Dr. Jill Quigley, MD
jill.shortDescription: Dr. Quigley has been practicing medicine since 2008 and is board certified in Family Medicine. She is dedicated to providing exceptional care in a timely manner to every patient.

trish.name: Trish Peery
trish.shortDescription: With a background in insurance and finance, Trish ensures that our office runs smoothly and that your experience is seamless from start to finish.

findUsSection.description: We are conveniently located in Littleton, CO. Visit us for your medical examination needs.

jill.name: Dr. Jill Quigley, MD
bioParagraphs: Dr. Quigley grew up in the Kansas City, Missouri area, attended medical school at the University of Missouri-Columbia School of Medicine, and completed family medicine residency at Wake Forest University School of Medicine. She has been practicing medicine since 2008 and is board certified in Family Medicine.

After practicing family medicine for more than 16 years, she was excited to embark on a new, more focused journey in medicine performing specific medical examinations as an FAA-designated aviation medical examiner performing pilot physicals, FMCSA-certified medical examiner performing DOT physicals, and USCIS-designated civil surgeon performing immigration medical examinations. She also wanted to continue seeing children and adolescents for their school/sports/camp physicals. She strives to give exceptional care in a timely manner to every patient. She believes in honest clear communication, listening, caring about the details, being on time, and mutual respect.
Dr. Quigley is happily married with two dogs. She enjoys traveling, hiking, skiing, gardening, music, and reading.

trish.name: Trish Peery
bioParagraphs: Trish worked at Dr. Quigley's family practice for 10 years as her front office manager. Her previous background was in the insurance and finance industry working for State Farm and Edward Jones. She continues to hold her CO Insurance License.
Trish enjoys travel, jogging, skiing, and family. She is looking forward to working for Dr. Quigley as they serve the community with care, compassion, and life balance.

contactSubSection.message: Contact us to schedule an appointment or to learn more about the services we offer.
